text: Dimaadua e helekai, “Babylon, doo gi lala mo do lohongo king, noho i lodo nia gohu gelegele. I mua gei goe nogo gili madammaa giagia be di waahale digi kumidia, malaa, dolomeenei gei goe gu hagalee gili madammaa balabala, gu gulugulua! Dolomeenei gei goe guu hai di hege!47.1 Isaiah 13.1—14.23; Jeremiah 50.1; 51.64
